module: Module-level comment: The 'daccc' module manages DAC and ADC conversion in sync within an IC, utilizing specific clocks. Key functionalities include generating main/bit clocks (mclkgen), detecting clock flanks (dflancb, dflancp), and processing data through shift registers (shiftreg32b, shiftreg32bsp). It controls data flow and timing, crucial for accurate digital-analog signal conversion.
